item.title: Pricing
item.description: 🎨 New Custom Website: $500 🏡 Website Hosting: $7/mo. (billed monthly) 🚀 Existing Website Migration: $90 Please direct all questions and/or requests to my email.

item.title: Unchaining Your Digital Life from Corporate Greed
item.description: Tracking ways I’m currently wresting control of my digital identity back from the Axis of Evil (MAAMA, a.k.a. Microsoft Amazon Apple Meta & Alphabet): Messenger & WhatsApp -> 📧Signal Goodreads -> 📚Open Library Twitter -> 🐘Mastadon GMail -> ⚛️Proton Mail ❌ Delete Instagram ❌ Delete All Personal Data on Google Drive/Mail/Docs I’ll add more to this, probably personal justifications, as I have time. For right now, my ranking trust for services is:
